message: Anyone out there?  Hoping Convore will be a useful channel during Strange Loop 2011.
I told them to assume 3 devices per attendee  :)
Yeah, good luck with that. Phone + Tablet + Laptop + Foot Massager  == overloaded wifi
iOS client works too.
Sounds about right.
Yeah, saw it.
the vorepad app on ipad is really, really nice
Convore has iOS support it seems, any love for the Android folks?
I wonder if we could get a C.W. McCall remix of Convoy to go with it.
Will milk be made available?
Testing from android phone
not sure if there is an android one yet
of course, that presumes the wifi is working properly of course :)
just posted from my android phone there on the browser. seemed to work just fine
who need a stinking app?
Maybe.
Ah, right on.
No push though so they must not let you subscribe to a thread.
Looks like winning.
anyone have questions about Strange Loop?  drop 'em here if so.
Basically, in the wifi range, with other interested folks, with or without beers, digging deeper into the topics of the day.
milk: no, bring your own milk
lobby has a bar, chairs
there is also the brand new rooftop 360 lounge which overlooks busch stadium
Cool.

Seriously though, what's the venue like in terms of after-hours conversation? That's one thing I love about CodeMash, there are conclaves all around the venue with some great conversations until early AM hours.
there is also the "market street bar or grille or something" connected to the lobby
great views
At code mash, you can usually find the speakers hanging out too, talking to folks, and giving feedback/answering questions in the evening hours as well.
conclaves: many options
it just opened a couple weeks ago and it's really, really nice

Bars and lounges are great chill zones, I'm thinking more the "I'm so stoked about the latest Erlang bits I saw today, I'm going to sit with several guys I just met and hack out a quick demo site so I remember how they work."
I'll just give you the keys to my room and you can hang there
that is possible in the hotel lounge, although probably not ideal. during the conf, the Grand Suites I/II room will be open for this most of the time
Uhm, awkward. ;)
Actually I'm not sure I booked a hotel yet...
I should also mention that there is both a Starbucks and a yogurt joint in the lobby of the hotel
heh, just kidding.
okay, found my conf, so i'm good - the hilton
I think if you tip them well, they'll mix them together
FYI all, I think convore is meant to be a cross between chat and discussion board. So post lots and have fun!
Energy mints rock!
So no lightning talks this year?
nope - I had them in the schedule originally but had so many awesome talks submitted that we used that space for sessions instead
me at this conf someone has used the word disambiguate and then wondered aloud if it was a word.
In A Tale of Three Trees... This is the second ti
Will there be a bag check for people checking out tomorrow?
Conference is going great! Bag check? Good question bulletsweetp
Strange Loop is definitely something I recommend! I am glad 2011 went so well!  :)
